Hello!
As promised, I publish a story about the customer‚Äôs project (with his permission :-)))
Understood with loading video, and unfortunately at this tonight, until next weekend. (working on projects only on weekends)
What to do?
I showed the message
@Pexo:  [this](/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/1DfrA2M9Qra6stqT6tzwNMYNweswY54KAC/1545597889)
and the customer liked the idea very much, but unfortunately, they don‚Äôt want to give me mockups (they don‚Äôt know how to draw, they only pay money) ((and without mock-ups it‚Äôs very hard to do something (therefore, the design is so poor)
If you wish, please make a site layout with functionality as described by @Pexo:  [this](/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/1DfrA2M9Qra6stqT6tzwNMYNweswY54KAC/1545597889)
Be sure to multilingual, at least 9 languages.
#Do you have a gif?
*Chromium is cool, and once again proved that you can not trust the file extension :-))*  

Edit: *Use Chromium based browser to see GiF*
 And clear cache Ctrl + F5

Architecture

How do you like architecture? it is not perfect ... but I have to create it, because of the story with the customer ...
Remember I said I would kick him over the weekend so he would give mockups?
So, I received a retaliatory strike in the form of $ and tasks to come up with design and architecture both in social networks and for all occasions, and so that (node / cluster / site) anyone could connect the customer to his site (ie, come up with a standard).

Total philosophy
1) There should be a folder in which only folders
2) Or folders in which only files
If there is at least 1 file in the folder, then the folder is counted as (group with files).

Note, chrome and fox do not support additional tracks, however it is not a reason to abandon the voice acting.
The customer said that the site would have to be divided into (node / cluster / site), 1 (node / cluster / site) is 4 TB of disk space (3.64TB to be exact).

comment.body:
@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: Very interesting! after the current project I will write to you if there is time.
When I'm done, I will post the results of the development on the page and add the images to my portfolio))

@Pexo: 

HAHAH)) dude you are lucky, I make this order)) at the customer 50% less requirements, but he also ordered this functionality.
If there is a desire to make a layout by any means in Peinte or Photoshop ,.
I can make any style on css, you can take inspiration here.

https://www.pinme.ru/search?q=design+site&color_id=
https://www.pinterest.ru/search/pins/?q=design%20site&rs=typed&term_meta%5B%5D=site%7Ctyped


Tomorrow I will publish the probe and will test the video player.
We really miss the designer or the person who draws or sticks the layout.
Before the publication of the portfolio left 24 hours. Follow the news))

@Pexo: Yes, the customer takes the media space, I think the site will be anime, hentai, music, books, several chats on one page.
And a few of your ideas, the project will be open.
Now he is on the test address.
Be sure to multilingual, at least 9 languages (the customer probably will hire translators or use Google translator like me).
I think the development should always start with the layout, so I‚Äôll kick the customer the whole week)) maybe it will draw something before the weekend))
